Easter Flowers

April 8, 2013

WHAT? GRANIZADO OGLESBY SENT FLOWERS AGAINS?

These flowers right here…

They can see me when my eyes are open, but they can’t see me when my eyes are closed.

HA HA HA SILLY FLOWERS CAN’T SEE ME.

Saint Patrick's Day

April 7, 2013

Traditionally on Saint Patrick’s Day somebody in the house has to dress as a leprechaun. This year it’s Riu’s turn. Again.

She’s not happy about it and wants to call social services.

OH HAI STACEY I’M BEING CHARACTERISED AS A CULTURAL STEREOTYPE. I’M BEING BESMIRCHED AND BELITTLED…

…BEING BESMIRCHED AND BELITTLED, BEGORRAH…

HA HA HA.

Riu Goes to Visit Castellfollit de La Roca

April 6, 2013

Over Easter weekend Riu went up to the top of the church tower at the top of the town at the top of the cliffs.

She looked over the edge…

Then she went inside…

Piglet on the tobogans

April 4, 2013

Piglet has started to go down the tobogans (or slides if you prefer). She’s quite adept at climbing up the little steps, then she composes herself and sits down at the top. She rolls over onto her tummy before letting go and sliding down. I think she prefers sliding down on her back but can’t quite organise herself yet to start out that way at the top.

Enjoy her latest video.

New Springtime Dress

…and sunhat.

Just in time for springtime, courtesy of Riu’s Auntie Nicola.

Thank you Auntie Nicola.

More About Lemons

April 2, 2013

Now to grade the lemons.

Fruity on the nose.

Only by tasting the fruit can one truly appreciate its taste.

OM NOM NOM NOM.

HMMM, LEMONY.
